Limited overnight cooling is expected, with Friday and Saturday morning lows as warm as the lower 80s. * WHERE...Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Camden, Pasquotank, southern Perquimans, Currituck, and southeastern Chowan Counties and the southeastern City of Virginia Beach through 800 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Virginia Beach to near Pleasant Grove. Movement was east at 45 mph.
